data.title: Rhema Bible Church
data.meta_description: Together we are brining hope, help and healing to the world! Service times Sunday 10 a.m. & 6 p.m. “Hour of Power” Wednesday 7 p.m..
data.meta_site_name: Rhema Bible Church - Rhema Bible Church
data.text:
Rhema Bible Church – Hour of Power is canceled tonight due to inclement weather.

Click Here Services On Demand

Welcome Home!

Service Times

Sunday: 10 a.m. & 6 p.m.

School of the Bible (Sunday School): Sunday @ 9 a.m.

Wednesday, Hour of Power: 7 p.m.

You are only a visitor once at Rhema Bible Church! No matter where you’re from or what you’ve experienced, we have something for you. Our message is simple: We’re bringing hope, help, and healing to the world.

"My family drives ... about 1 hr. 10 min. every Sunday to attend this wonderful life-changing church! ... The saying 'A church alive is worth the drive,' is so true! ... Once we experienced Rhema Bible Church, we felt like we were home. Thank you, Pastors! God Bless!"

—K. Oliver

We're glad you're here.
